<img src='http://www.lifewatch.be/code/images/lwde_birds.png' class='rightimg'  />

Data from the Lifewatch bird tracking project collected by stations in Ostend, Zeebrugge and Vlissingen.
- Partners : INBO, UGent, UAntwerpen, VLIZ, UvA
- Period : from 2013-05-01 on
- Some project data is under moratorium, login to get full access
- Use query options to restrict data to several birds or species (HG,LBB,MH)
- Data points are grouped according to selected sample period

[IMIS metadata record](http://www.vliz.be/en/imis?module=dataset&dasid=5249)
